abstract: The American International Group said Wednesday afternoon that it has settled its long-running legal battle with Maurice R. Greenberg, the company’s former chief executive, in an attempt to move past years of contentious fighting.
snippet: The American International Group said Wednesday afternoon that it has settled its long-running legal battle with Maurice R. Greenberg, the company’s former chief executive, in an attempt to move past years of contentious fighting.
lead_paragraph: Update | 8:45 a.m. The American International Group said Wednesday afternoon that it has settled its long-running legal battle with Maurice R. Greenberg, the company’s former chief executive, in an attempt to move past years of contentious fighting.

headline.main: A.I.G. Settles Legal Disputes With Greenberg

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
